name: cat-cg-project
description: Computergraphics Project at the TU Vienna - Release build

scripts.copy: npm run copyAssets && npm run copyExes && npm run copyReadme
scripts.copyExes: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const files = fs.readdirSync('./target/release'); files.forEach(f => f.endsWith('.exe') ? fs.cpSync('./target/release/' + f, './target/packaged/' + f) : null);"
